alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Polk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Polk and southeastern Dallas Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 331 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Waukee, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clive and Valley West Mall around 340 PM CDT. Urbandale around 345 PM CDT. Johnston around 350 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Grimes. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 71 and 72. Interstate 80 between mile markers 111 and 132. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
